DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study determine surgery technic provide best clinical outcome medial patellofemoral ligament reconstruction compare suture anchor screw fixation medial femoral condyle .
DOC.brief_title: Reconstruction Medial Patellofemoral Ligament - A Randomised Controlled Trial Comparing Two Surgery Technics
DOC.criteria: patella luxation , 2 time cartilage damage ( grad 3 )
